parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return for a single request. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Valid values:

*   You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.
*   You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to EXPRESSCONNECTROUTER.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description:
The tag.

You can specify at most 20 tags.
